newsitem.title: USA: United Air June freight rises 25% over 1996.
newsitem.headline: United Air June freight rises 25% over 1996.

text.p: United Airlines transported 25.2 percent more freight in June than in the same month a year earlier, the carrier said.
Total freight ton miles in June were 194 million, up from 155 million last year. Mail traffic declined 1.1 percent, holding the rise in total June cargo to 19.2 percent, the carrier said.

United's strong freight performance this year - first half freight traffic was up 21 percent - reflects several factors, including the addition of four McDonnell Douglas DC-10 freighters to the Pacific network and the growing number of Boeing 777 twinjets on the Atlantic. - Reuters Air Cargo Service Tel+ 44 171 542 7706 Fax +5017 - www.racs.com
